div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.
{% capture grouping_desc %}These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}A DiagnosticReport Profile meant to capture what should be represented in a report parsed from an IHE SDC Form{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}A DocumentReference Profile meant to share an IHE SDC Form whether completed or blank{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

{% capture desc %}A Observation Profile meant to capture Question and Answer Sets from an IHE SDC Form. Questions shold be added as a code and the answer should be added as an appropriate data type. If the answer is a single select it should be added as a valueCodeableConcept. If a Question is a Multiselect then component may be used to list multiple answers{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}

div.p: {% capture grouping_desc %}These are example instances that show what data produced and consumed by systems conforming with this implementation guide might look like{% endcapture %} {{ grouping_desc | markdownify}}

tr.td: {% capture desc %}Example Observation using codes from SDC{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
{% capture desc %}Example Observation using text fill in from SDC{% endcapture %} {{ desc | markdownify}}
